message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll love! My asking price is $120.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I think this product is great, $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $85 for it. What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget. I'm willing to come down to $105. This is a fair price considering the value of this product. Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, $105 is still a little too high for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $90.  Let's see if we can make this happen.
